meanings.definition: A person who is extremely interested in or devoted to a particular activity or subject.
meanings.sent1: The book club was full of tragics who couldn't wait to discuss the latest novel.
meanings.sent2: She was a tragic for astronomy, spending hours gazing at the stars.
meanings.sent3: The tragics at the chess tournament were so focused that they forgot to eat.
meanings.sent4: In the world of fashion, she was a tragic, always following the latest trends.
meanings.sent5: The tragics of history were thrilled to visit the ancient ruins.

meanings.definition: Causing or characterized by extreme distress or sorrow.
meanings.sent1: The tragic news of the accident left everyone in shock.
meanings.sent2: It was a tragic day when the old tree in the park was cut down.
meanings.sent3: The tragic movie made everyone in the theater shed a tear.
meanings.sent4: The tragic melody of the song touched the hearts of all who listened.
meanings.sent5: The tragic ending of the story left a lasting impact on the audience.
